body.header: IELTS Writing Task 2You should spend about 40 minutes on this task and write at least 250 words.

section.p: Present a written argument or case to an educated reader with no specialist knowledge of the following topics. In most countries, young people form a large proportion of those who are unemployed. Why is this the case, and what can be done to solve the problem? You should use your own ideas, knowledge and experience and support your arguments with examples and relevant evidence.
